generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings and crosswalks, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible on the left side of the road, separated by a curb and some barriers.
- building: Several multi-story buildings with windows and architectural features are visible on both sides of the street.
- wall: A large construction wall with scaffolding is present on the right side of the image.
- pole: Traffic light poles and other vertical poles are visible in the image.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing green signals.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating a right turn is visible on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees with bare branches are visible along the sidewalk and street.
- sky: The clear blue sky is visible above the buildings and street.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- car: A black car is visible behind the bus, stopped at the intersection.
- bus: A black bus with "NY WATERWAY" and "The Civilized Commute" written on the back is prominently visible in the center of the image.
- truck: A large truck or bus is visible on the left side of the image, partially obscured by a pole.
